sources.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe (1944)
sources.description: Two rival rodeos are competing for bookings. Gaby gets a gig in Albuquerque, but Madden's men destroy his equipment. Mystic Nights Videos

sources.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe (1944)
sources.description: Sandwiched in between the numerous musical numbers, the Gabby Whittaker and Madden rodeo's are competing for bookings. When Gabby gets a date in Albuquerque, Madden has his man destroy his equipment. Roy finds a broken rawhide rope at the scene and uses it to bring Madden to justice. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lights-of-old-santa-fe-1944/

sources.title: Lights Of Old Santa Fe (1944) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, George 'Gabby' Hayes
 Director: Frank McDonald

 Rival rodeos are operated by good guy Gabby and bad guy Richard Powers. Dale is trying to choose between them, aided ultimately by Roy and the Sons of the Pioneers (who are radio singers).

sources.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe (1944) Roy Rogers & Dale Evans | Western Musical | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Rival rodeos are operated by good guy Gabby and bad guy Richard Powers. Dale is trying to choose between them, aided ultimately by Roy and the Sons of the Pioneers (who are radio singers).

Director:Frank McDonald
Writers:Gordon Kahn
Stars:  Roy Rogers, Trigger, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Dale Evans
Genres: Western, Musical

When Gabby gets a date in Albuquerque, Madden has his man destroy his equipment. Roy finds a broken rawhide rope at the scene and uses it to bring Madden to justice.
